Changing the layout will wipe out any previous changes you have made to a page, and start you off with a new layout and a clean slate.

To change to a different Layout than what is currently being used on the page:

  • Click on the Layout button, then select Change.

  • An alert box will pop-up stating:

    Changing your layout will destroy all existing custom layout settings you have in place. Are you sure you want to continue?
  • Agree to continue.
  • The Select Layout modal will appear. Choose a new layout.
  • Once you are done making changes. Click Save.
